sentences.english: Conflow supplies high pressure underground equipment for coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 康福路为煤矿领域提供井下耐高压产品。

sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界沟煤矿位于淮北煤田南部，设计生产能力为0。

sentences.english: The picture shows Pingshuo Antaibao outdoor coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 图为平朔安太堡露天煤矿。

sentences.english: Yet coal mines are as much a part of China's civilization as paddy fields.
sentences.chinese: 然而，煤矿就像是供养中国文明成长的稻田。

sentences.english: The plan and technology of skip loading chamber construction in Jining No.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了济宁二号煤矿箕斗装载硐室施工方案及技术。

sentences.english: The coal mining area around Jiaozuo City has a history of nearly 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 焦作市煤矿区是一个有着近百年历史的老矿区。

sentences.english: In open-pit mines, the problem of underground mining under the slope is usually encountered.
sentences.chinese: 边坡下方井工开采是一个露天煤矿普遍存在的问题。

sentences.english: Eg: Application of the hoisting jack made by ourself in install of large colliery equipment.
sentences.chinese: 自制千斤顶在煤矿大型设备安装中的使用。

sentences.english: Coal mine flooding accident occurred in Inner Mongolia Wuhai.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古乌海发生煤矿透水事故。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Tangshan Coal Medical College Medical University, became a doctor 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于唐山煤矿医学院医疗系，从医三十多年。

sentences.english: The coalminers decided to go on strike for better working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿工许多人决定为争取更好的工作条件举行罢工。

sentences.english: Canaries were formerly used in coal mines for this reason.
sentences.chinese: 为此原因，露天煤矿以前经常使用金丝雀。

sentences.english: DL rent from Hai-Shan Coal Mine has also repainted into blue.
sentences.chinese: 租自海山煤矿的柴油机车也漆上了蓝色新漆。

sentences.english: The combustion is an important index of coal mine permissible explosive.
sentences.chinese: 爆燃性是煤矿炸药的一个重要安全指标。

sentences.english: Liuzhi Coal Mine is one of the areas in South Chica where karst water harm is serious.
sentences.chinese: 六枝矿区是我国南方煤矿水害严重地区之一。

sentences.english: Two days later we arrived in Datong, the coal-mining capital of Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 两天后我们到了大同，中国北方的煤矿之都。
